content: उत्कलिका {@--1@} Anxiety in general, uneasiness; जाता नोत्कलिका <ls>Amaru. 78</ls>; <ls>K. 138</ls>, <ls n="K.">205</ls>, <ls n="K.">210</ls>, <ls n="K.">234</ls>; <ls>Dk. 17</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">20.</ls> {@--2@} Longing for, regretting, missing anything or person. {@--3@} Wanton sport, dalliance (हेला) {@--4@} A bud. {@--5@} A wave; वनावलीरुत्कलिकासहस्रं <ls>Śi. 3. 70</ls>; क्षुभितमुत्कलिकातरलं मनः ruffled by waves <ls>Māl. 3. 10</ls> (where उत्कलिका also means anxiety); <ls>K. 161.</ls>
